topics.body:
You know. Females in comics ( usually  DC and Marvel stuff) ussually are dressed up in really tight or skimpy clothing.

I'd like to see a (good) comic where it's flipped on it's head and set in a world where all the dudes are dressed really skimpy, and all look really beefy and such; like they all dress like Lord Humongous. The women are completely covered and practically dressed.

But no GURL POWER or anything like that in it...that's annoying....

Also all the men have to do Jojo poses. Because you cant have beefy men walk around in tight and/or skimpy outfits without Jojo poses.
